forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High near 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear this evening then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 51F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 44F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
